content: MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance

Add 6 missing BRP method constants to src/tools.rs (BRP_METHOD_QUERY, BRP_METHOD_SPAWN, BRP_METHOD_REGISTRY_SCHEMA, BRP_METHOD_REPARENT, BRP_METHOD_GET_WATCH, BRP_METHOD_LIST_WATCH)

Create src/brp_tools/constants.rs and move all 24 JSON_FIELD_* constants from src/tools.rs
Add 19 new parameter constants to src/brp_tools/constants.rs
Update src/brp_tools/mod.rs to export the constants module
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating constants module
Update imports in src/brp_tools/tool_definitions.rs to use the new constants module
Replace ~38 hardcoded strings in src/brp_tools/tool_definitions.rs with constant references
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating tool_definitions.rs
Update src/brp_tools/support/watch_task.rs to use BRP method constants
Update src/brp_tools/brp_status.rs to use BRP_METHOD_LIST constant
Update src/brp_tools/support/request_handler/extractors.rs to use parameter constants

Update imports in remaining ~10 brp_tools files to use brp_tools::constants instead of tools::JSON_FIELD_*
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after all import updates

Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings -W clippy::all -W clippy::pedantic -W clippy::nursery -W clippy::cargo -A clippy::multiple_crate_versions -A clippy::cargo_common_metadata
Fix any clippy issues (remove dead code, don't use _ prefixes)
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
STOP work and prepare for code review subagent task
Task new subagent to review changes focusing on duplication and complexity (read-only)
When subagent returns, STOP and review suggested changes with the user
